data.text: @StarAdvertiser suggest to reconsider this notion for the long term of the state over all health and wellness.
@StarAdvertiser End this anti science mask BS…NOW.  Harming our Keiki!

@StarAdvertiser Tremendous news! So happy to see #hawaii returning to #normal.

@GovHawaii Only one thing left...

@GavidIde @StarAdvertiser People who advocate using bio warfare weapons like woven cloth masks in enclosed areas are engaged in crimes against humanity and should be prosecuted as the war criminals they are.
@StarAdvertiser Is a private school classroom an “indoor public setting”?  Are there any HI private schools that have dropped the mask requirement?
@J_Green_ @StarAdvertiser Money makes a big difference, Jared!

@StarAdvertiser Thank you to all who participated in our Safe Travels program. The ending of the program has NOTHING to do with the federal funding for it coming to a close. I promise. That’s just a coincidence.
@StarAdvertiser Why did he have to delay it? Why not immediately?
